extendedInfo.description: This app is a complete new experience: Tune your car with rims from Dozu Tuning Wheels!Following the great success of the app, Dotz has boosted the application with a new QR code scanner, a magazine reader were you can browse all Dotz Print Mags and the popular wheel configurator. In the future, every Dotz wheel at your local tuning shop comes with a QR code you can scan with your mobile phone or tablet to get to all the product info on the Dotz website. All your scans are logged in a history so you can see what rims you have already looked at. The configurator comes with the new highlight out of the 2013 collection: - Fast Fifteen- Fast Fifteen blaze- Fast Fifteen red edt.- Fast Fifteen green edt. With the Dotz app you can give your car a mobile overhaul and treat your vehicle to some virtual Dotz rims.Simply start the Dotz app, take a picture of your car, select a wheel and begin pimping your vehicle. The application allows you to virtually put all available Dotz rims on your car in a matter of minutes. In addition, you can choose from a selection of logos and graphics to make stylish finishing touches. You can choose from rims that fit with your actual car setup or even put any product from the Dotz portfolio onto your ride. Whatever you do, the new Dotz app makes it easy for you to fulfill your tuning fantasies. When youâve finished creating your masterpiece, send the pictures to a friend, post them on Facebook or publish them in the specially designed App Gallery on dotzmag.com. And if your virtual setup is so compelling that you want to recreate it in reality, the app lets you find the nearest Dotz dealer at the touch of a button."Dealer Check" is available in:AustriaBelgiumCzech RepublicDenkmarkGermanyGreat BritainHungaryItalyNetherlandsPolandSwedenPhotos uploaded to the dotzmag.com Gallery can be found here:http://www.dotzmag.com/gallery/appgallery
